files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,39 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    android:orientation="vertical">
+
+	<!--用户登录界面-->
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/login"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:textSize="18sp"
+        android:textColor="@android:color/white"
+        android:layout_marginTop="22dp"
+        android:text="登录"
+        android:layout_below="@+id/password"
+        android:layout_alignParentLeft="true"
+        android:layout_alignParentStart="true" />
+
+    <EditText
+        android:id="@+id/password"
+        android:layout_marginTop="22dp"
+        android:hint="输入密码"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_below="@+id/username"
+        android:layout_alignParentLeft="true"
+        android:layout_alignParentStart="true" />
+
+    <EditText
+        android:id="@+id/username"
+        android:layout_marginTop="102dp"
+        android:hint="输入用户名"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_alignParentTop="true"
+        android:layout_alignParentLeft="true"
+        android:layout_alignParentStart="true" />
+</RelativeLayout>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,53 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+    android:id="@+id/activity_net1414080903110__submit"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    android:paddingBottom="@dimen/activity_vertical_margin"
+    android:paddingLeft="@dimen/activity_horizontal_margin"
+    android:paddingRight="@dimen/activity_horizontal_margin"
+    android:paddingTop="@dimen/activity_vertical_margin"
+    tools:context="edu.hzuapps.androidlabs.homeworks.net1414080903110.Net1414080903110_SubmitActivity">
+
+	<!--作业提交界面-->
+    <EditText
+        android:id="@+id/work_info"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:ems="10"
+        android:hint="作业名称"
+        android:layout_alignParentLeft="true"
+        android:layout_alignParentStart="true"
+        android:layout_alignParentTop="true">
+    <requestFocus/>
+    </EditText>
+
+    <Button
+        android:text="提交"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:id="@+id/submit"
+        android:layout_below="@+id/add_content"
+        android:layout_alignRight="@+id/work_info"
+        android:layout_alignEnd="@+id/work_info"
+        android:layout_marginTop="52dp" />
+
+    <EditText
+        android:id="@+id/add_content"
+        android:layout_width="fill_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:enabled="true"
+        android:gravity="top"
+        android:inputType="textMultiLine"
+        android:minLines="8"
+        android:maxLines="10"
+        android:scrollbars="vertical"
+        android:layout_marginTop="33dp"
+        android:background="@android:drawable/edit_text"
+        android:hint="作业内容"
+        android:layout_below="@+id/work_info"
+        android:layout_alignParentLeft="true"
+        android:layout_alignParentStart="true" />
+
+</RelativeLayout>

@@ -0,0 +1,35 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+    android:id="@+id/activity_net1414080903110_twork"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    android:paddingBottom="@dimen/activity_vertical_margin"
+    android:paddingLeft="@dimen/activity_horizontal_margin"
+    android:paddingRight="@dimen/activity_horizontal_margin"
+    android:paddingTop="@dimen/activity_vertical_margin"
+    tools:context="edu.hzuapps.androidlabs.homeworks.net1414080903110.Net1414080903110_WorkListActivity">
+
+	<!--作业列表界面-->
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/btn1"
+        android:layout_width="100dp"
+        android:layout_height="60dp"
+        android:layout_alignParentBottom="true"
+        android:layout_centerHorizontal="true"
+        android:layout_weight="1"
+        android:text="布置作业"
+        />
+    <ListView
+        android:id="@+id/list_view"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:divider="#00000000"
+        android:dividerHeight="20dp"
+
+        />
+
+
+
+
+</RelativeLayout>

@@ -0,0 +1,19 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent">
+
+	<!--作业列表TextView样式-->
+    <TextView
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_weight="8"
+        android:id="@+id/work_name"
+        android:layout_gravity="center_vertical"
+        android:layout_marginLeft="10dp"
+        android:layout_marginTop="2dp"
+        android:lineSpacingExtra="10dp"
+        android:textSize="18sp"
+        android:textColor="#0000CC"
+        />
+</LinearLayout>
